Terre_Haute.Federal Correctional Complex, Terre Haut:
The Federal Correctional Complex, Terre Haute (FCC Terre Haute) is a United States federal prison complex for male inmates in Terre Haute, Indiana. It is operated by the Federal Bureau of Prisons, a division of the United States Department of Justice, and consists of two facilities:
Federal Correctional Institution, Terre Haute (FCI Terre Haute): a medium-security facility with a Communication Management Unit which holds inmates who are deemed to require increased monitoring of communications with others.
United States Penitentiary, Terre Haute (USP Terre Haute): a high-security facility which holds federal death row for men and also has a prison camp for minimum-security male offenders.
